title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, not all saved editors are being closed as expected.
EB: I expect that when I select 'Close All Saved,' it should close all the saved editors, ensuring that no unsaved changes are lost.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Close all open editors.
3. Create a new file (e.g., f1.txt).
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
